sourceMeaningMnemonic: When a <radical>spirit</radical> decides to live in your <radical>scarecrow</radical>, you'll be granted good <kanji>luck</kanji> and good <kanji>fortune</kanji>. Crows won't hang out in your farm. Everything you grow will become large and delicious. But not everyone is so lucky that a spirit will decide to live in their scarecrow. So maybe the luck was in you all along!
meaningInfo: Nope, the luck is definitely coming from the spirit in your scarecrow. You aren't lucky on your own.
readingMnemonic: You want to check the scarecrow to make sure your recent <kanji>luck</kanji> is coming from it, so you kick it. "<reading>F***</reading> (<ja>ふく</ja>) you!" it yells. Oh yeah, there's a spirit in there.
readingInfo: If you get a luck spirit to say f*** you, you might accidentally convince it to move somewhere else. If it does, you lose your luck. So be careful.
